T04D3867:336b-24: bdun cu pa yi rnam par byed pa 'dir gsal byas //
T04D3867:336b-25: gang zhig thugs rje'i bdag nyid thub pa'i dbang po yis //
T04D3867:336b-26: yun ring sa dus nas 'bad pa chen pos mdzad pa yi //
T04D3867:336b-27: de yang ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa zhes bya 'di //
T04D3867:336b-28: lam chen rgyal ba thams cad rjes su gshegs pa ste //
T04D3867:336b-29: de la 'jug phyir stong nyid bdun cu zhes bya ba'i //
T04D3867:336b-30: bstan bcos gang zhig 'phags pa klu sgrub ces bya bas //
T04D3867:336b-31: gsungs pa de ni bdag gis rnam par phye ba yi //
T04D3867:336b-32: dge ba gang gis skye bos sangs rgyas nyid gyur
T04D3867:336b-33: cig / stong nyid bdun cu pa'i rgya cher 'grel
T04D3867:336b-34: pa slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs
T04D3867:336b-37: / stong nyid bdun cu'i 'grel pa ni //
T04D3867:336b-38: dge slong dharma grags kyis bsgyur //
T04D3867:336b-39: gzhung grangs stong phrag gnyis dang ni //
T04D3867:336b-40: brgya phrag gcig gis lhag pa yin //
T04D3867:336b-41: dpal na len dra'i gtsug lag khang du pandi ta aa bha y'a k'a ra dang /
